remarks.format:
## Remarks Both transaction and just-in-time (JIT) activation enable synchronization automatically.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
Applying <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationAttribute> to a context-bound object results in the creation of a wait handle and auto reset event, which are not deterministically garbage collected. Therefore, you should not create a large number of context-bound objects marked with the `SynchronizationAttribute` within a short time period.
